summary: A unique and creatable blued steel plate armor for Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
[youtube]h0aHP7b6x-c[/youtube]

Special thanks to  lemonman131 for the video!

I took Timmy19992\'s steel plate texture and I spruced it up, added chain mail and made it a unique and creatable item in Skyrim. This requires the advanced smithing perk and a special ingredient for the bluing process; male, female and all race compatible.

A matching set of Helms can be found here: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24593]\"Ancestral Helms\"[/url]

If you like this armor, check out my other armor mods:

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32072]\"Gilded Steel Plate Armor\"[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31796]\"Steel Armor Tweaks\"[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31803]\"Nordic Carved Armor Tweaks\"[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32516]\"Gilded Nordic Carved Armor\"[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32715]\"Stalhrim with Scalemail\"[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/33772]\"Imperial Legion Reborn\"[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34040]\"Hero of the Legion\"[/url]


Credit goes to PhilSchmidheiny for his \"Ornate Steel Plate Armor Texture\" resource that is used for my\"Gilded Steel Plate\" armor, parts of which are present in this mod. Permission to use these textures is given by PhilSchmidheiny [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12363]here[/url]. 
Original textures by PhilSchmidheiny, all other work by ViperMkII.

Credit goes to Timmy19992 for his black and gold steel plate texture which served as a base for this mod. Permission obtained via private message.

Tremendous appreciation goes to PhilSchmidheiny and Timmy19992 for their original works.
author: viperMkII
